oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Morro Castle, from the Old Fortification, Santiago Harbor, Cuba
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: View of Castillo de San Pedro del Morro (Morro Castle) in Santiago Harbor from the Old Fortification.
Construction of Morro Castle began in 1640 and was rebuilt in 1664 after the English pirate, Henry Morgan, reduced it to rubble. Also used to hold political prisoners.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Castillo del Morro (Santiago de Cuba, Cuba); Santiago de Cuba Bay (Cuba)
Forts & fortifications; Cannon balls; Military facilities; Harbors
